title: CodeAssist - Professional Development Framework
shortDescription: Complete skills-based framework for professional software development with Laravel, Python, JavaScript, and mobile support
longDescription:
CodeAssist is a comprehensive development framework that combines the Superpowers skills methodology with professional development workflows. It provides:

**Core Features:**
- 26+ production-tested skills for development workflows
- Mandatory database safety protocols (prevents data loss)
- Brainstorm → Plan → Implement cycle for systematic development
- TDD-based skill validation
- Framework-specific guides (Laravel/PHP, Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Mobile)
- Self-hosted development tools integration (Tailscale, Ollama, n8n)

**Skills Include:**
- Core Workflow: brainstorming, writing-plans, executing-plans, code-review, verification-before-completion
- Safety: database-backup (CRITICAL), pre-commit-hooks, defense-in-depth
- Testing: test-driven-development, paratest-setup, testing-anti-patterns
- Workflow: git-workflow, git-worktrees, dispatching-parallel-agents
- Framework Setup: Laravel API, Next.js PWA, React Native, FastAPI

**Why CodeAssist:**
- Based on real production incidents (2 database wipes prevented)
- Persuasion principles ensure reliable AI agent behavior
- Industry best practices from professional development teams
- Complete with agents, hooks, commands, and testing framework

**Perfect for:**
- Professional development teams
- Solo developers wanting enterprise-grade workflows
- Projects requiring high reliability and safety
- Multi-framework development (Laravel + React Native + PWA)
- Teams using self-hosted development infrastructure
